metadata.name: Expressionism with Nakshi Kantha
metadata.description:
Nakshi Kantha is a type of traditional embroidered quilt inspired from traditional Bengal traditions. The artist used the running stitch style with brushes to mimic the "kantha stitch" used for making the Nakshi Kantha. This kantha features the venerated white elephants of parts of South Asia such in India, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Myanmar. Also featured are an old palace and a woman threshing rice! Collect this to your world quilt collection! 
1 out of 3
